common.baseLineTip: Please enter a number greater than 0

device.title: Machine
device.diskTip: For details of all disks, click the icon in the upper right corner.

description.ip: The IP address of the host
description.gitInfo: The Commit ID of the current version
description.leader: The IP address and port of the leader
description.peers: The IP addresses and ports of all the replicas
description.losts: The IP addresses and ports of replicas at fault
description.jobId: The first row shows the job ID, and the other rows show the task IDs.
description.command: The first row shows the command executed, and the other rows show on which storaged processes the task is running.
description.longTermStatus: Shows the status of the job or task.
description.longTermStartTime: Shows a timestamp indicating the time when the job or task enters the RUNNING phase.
description.longTermStopTime: Shows a timestamp indicating the time when the job or task gets FINISHED, FAILED, or STOPPED.

metric_description.cpu_wait: The percentage of CPU waiting for IO operations
metric_description.cpu_user: The percentage of CPU used by users
metric_description.cpu_system: The percentage of CPU used by the system
metric_description.memory_actual_used: The memory space used (not including caches)
metric_description.load_1m: The average load of the system in the last 1 minute
metric_description.load_5m: The average load of the system in the last 5 minutes
metric_description.load_15m: The average load of the system in the last 15 minutes
metric_description.disk_readbytes: The number of bytes that the system reads in the disk per second
metric_description.disk_writebytes: The number of bytes that the system writes in the disk per second
metric_description.disk_readiops: The number of read queries that the disk receives per second
metric_description.disk_writeiops: The number of write queries that the disk receives per second
metric_description.network_in_rate: The number of bytes that the network card receives per second
metric_description.network_out_rate: The number of bytes that the network card sends out per second
metric_description.network_in_errs: The number of wrong bytes that the network card receives per second
metric_description.network_out_errs: The number of wrong bytes that the network card sends out per second
metric_description.network_in_packets: The number of data packages that the network card receives per second
metric_description.network_out_packets: The number of data packages that the network card sends out per second
metric_description.slow_query_latency_us: The average latency of slow queries
metric_description.num_query_errors: The number of queries in error
metric_description.add_edges_atomic_latency_us: The single latency of adding edges
metric_description.add_edges_latency_us: The average latency of adding edges
metric_description.add_vertices_latency_us: The average latency of adding vertices
metric_description.delete_edges_latency_us: The average latency of deleting edges
metric_description.delete_vertices_latency_us: The average latency of deleting vertices
metric_description.get_neighbors_latency_us: The average latency of querying neighbors
metric_description.num_active_queries: The number of queries currently being executed
metric_description.num_sentences: Number of queries received by the service
metric_description.num_query_errors_leader_changes: The number of queries to which Leader Changes occurred
metric_description.num_killed_queries: The number of queries that were killed
metric_description.num_queries_hit_memory_watermark: The number of queries that reached the memory threshold
metric_description.num_opened_sessions: Number of sessions established by the server
metric_description.num_auth_failed_sessions: Number of sessions that failed login authentication
metric_description.num_auth_failed_sessions_bad_username_pa: Number of sessions that failed to authenticate due to incorrect user names and passwords
metric_description.num_auth_failed_sessions_out_of_max_allo: Number of sessions that failed to validate the FLAG_OUT_OF_MAX_ALLOWED_CONNECTIONS parameter
metric_description.num_reclaimed_expired_sessions: Number of expired sessions reclaimed by the server
metric_description.commit_snapshot_latency_us: Raft commit snapshot of time delay
metric_description.num_rpc_sent_to_metad: Number of RPC requests sent to Metad
metric_description.num_rpc_sent_to_metad_failed: Number of FAILED RPC requests sent to Metad
metric_description.num_rpc_sent_to_storaged: Number of RPC requests sent to Storaged
metric_description.num_rpc_sent_to_storaged_failed: Number of FAILED RPC requests sent to Storaged
metric_description.num_edges_deleted: The number of edges to delete
